title: Arcaea song metadata
description: The metadatas of songs in Arcaea

id.description: The id of the song, used to find the folder containing the aff files and other resources

title_localized.description: The title of the song, localized in various languages

jacket_localized.description: Should localized jacket be used in various languages

bpm.description: The bpm of the song, only used for displaying

bpm_base.description: The bpm used to calculating the speed of the chart.

set.description: The pack id of the song specified in the packlist file

purchase.description: The id of purchased item that is needed to play this song, normally id of song or pack

audioPreview.description: The start timestamp of song preview, in milliseconds

audioPreviewEnd.description: The end timestamp of song preview, in milliseconds

side.description: The side of the song, 0 for light and 1 for conflict.

world_unlock.description: Should playing the song needs to get it unlocked in world mode

byd_local_unlock.description: Should the unlock state of beyond difficult of the song saved locally (instead of saved online)

songlist_hidden.description: Should the song be hidden in the songlist before unlocking it.

bg.description: The name of the background used when playing the song

bg_daynight.description: The name of the background used when playing the song with a partner which can change the side of the song

day.description: The name of the background used when playing the song in the day

night.description: The name of the background used when playing the song in the night

date.description: The Unix timestamp of the time when the song is added, used to sort the songs by time

version.description: The version where the song was published, used to categorize songs by version

remote_dl.description: Is the assets of the song stored on the remote server

source_localized.description: The source of the song, localized in various languages

source_copyright.description: The copyright infomation of the song

ratingClass.description: The rating class of the difficulty, 0 for past, 1 for present  2 for future, and 3 for beyond

chartDesigner.description: The designer of the chart in the difficulty

jacketDesigner.description: The designer of the jacket in the difficulty

rating.description: The rating of the difficult, 0 for "?", other number for corresponding number value. before 3.0.0 it is 0 for "?", 10 for "9+", 11 for "10" and 1~9 for corresponding number value

ratingPlus.description: Should the difficult of the chart annotated with a plus sign, like 9+, 10+.

plusFingers.description: Should this charts be played with more than two fingers.This field is not longer used

jacketOverride.description: Is a different jacket used in the difficulty

jacket_night.description: The name of the jacket used in the night in the difficulty

hidden_until_unlocked.description: Should this chart be hidden in the songlist before unlocking it.

localized_string.$comment: The schema is used as a schema for localized string
